alert.note: Alert for Apple and Lucerne Valleys; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 14 at 3:59AM PST until January 14 at 3:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 55 mph, locally up to 60 mph below the San Gorgonio Pass. * WHERE...San Bernardino County Mountains, Apple and Lucerne Valleys and San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning. * WHEN...Through 3 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds will occur on the desert slopes of the San Bernardino mountains into the High Desert and below the San Gorgonio Pass. Winds will peak this morning.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Apple and Lucerne Valleys; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning
